data.actual_result: Arrows appear not aligned if one of the sections has a scroll bar while another does not
data.expected_result: Arrows positioning are not affected by the scroll bar and stay aligned at all times
data.short_description: User options menu section arrows are moved more to the right when they have a scroll bar
data.steps_to_repro: - Right-click on a user to open their options menu - See that the arrows on "Invite to Server", "Roles", or "Move To" are more to the right if they have enough entries to create a scroll bar
